data.title: Free Events
data.meta_description: A complete list of free concerts, festivals and other events shows taking place throughout the state of New Jersey.
data.text:
Below are listings for free cultural events in New Jersey. They are listed alphabetically and grouped together by county. To request adding something to the list, please email the information to njartsdaily@gmail.com.

ATLANTIC COUNTY

Atlantic City

Mardi Gras on the Boardwalk at Kennedy Plaza

Aug. 21: The Dirty Dozen Brass Band, The Howard Isaacson Band

Aug. 28: Samantha Fish, Billy C. Wirth & the Nighthawks

Sept. 4: The Tony Mart Allstars featuring Billy Walton and Brian “Coconutz” Varhelyi, classic rock guitar tribute

Somers Point

Concerts on the Beach at Morrow Beach

Aug. 23: Jimmy Carpenter Band

Aug. 30: Tommy Castro & the Painkillers

Sept. 6: Tony Mart Allstars

Ventnor

Summer Beach Jam at Newport Avenue Beach

Aug. 24: The Exceptions, Plaid Salmon

Aug. 31: Big House Band, Ricky Stevens

Sunset at Ski Beach series

Aug. 21: Frontiers (Journey tribute), Kick It Out (Heart tribute)

Aug. 28: The Usual Suspects
